common.typeHasNoSettings: This type has no settings available

format.title: Format
format.desc: Enter a valid momentjs format to display the date with.

min.title: Minimum
min.desc: The lowest value the slider can be set to.

max.title: Maximum
max.desc: The highest value the slider can be set to.

step.title: Step
step.desc: The amount the slider value will change when moved left or right one time.

hideLimits.title: Hide limits
hideLimits.desc: Whether to hide the limits of the slider

icon.title: Icon
icon.desc: Set a custom icon to use instead of a star.

count.title: Count
count.desc: Set a custom icon count rather than the default of 5.

format.title: Format
format.desc: The format to apply to the date value.

placeholder.title: Placeholder
placeholder.desc: What text to show when the date is empty.

icon.title: Icon
icon.desc: The icon to show for the date-picker button.

useDefaultDropdown.title: Use default dropdown
useDefaultDropdown.desc: Whether to use the default dropdown.

optionsType.title: Options type
optionsType.desc: Whether to use manually defined options or a different dynamic way of determining available options.

manual.allowCreateDesc: Whether to show a button to create a new option in the popup menu.
manual.optionsDesc: The manually created choices this select can be set to.

dynamic.typeDesc: Which method to use to dynamically determine available options.
dynamic.emptyLabelDesc: The text that will show when the value is empty.

folderPaths.title: Folder paths
folderPaths.desc: Notes in the following folders will be options for this select.

excludeFolderNotes.title: Exclude Folder Notes
excludeFolderNotes.desc: Whether to exclude notes that have the same name as their folder.

tags.title: Tag(s)
tags.desc: Notes with all of the following tags will be shown as this select's options.

includeNestedTags.title: Include Nested Tags
includeNestedTags.desc: Whether to include files containing a nested tag of one of the selected tags. For example, whether to include a note with the tag "food/fruit" when "food" is a selected tag.

code.title: JavaScript code
code.desc: Provide a function which returns an array of options.

filePath.title: JavaScript file
filePath.desc: Select the path to a JavaScript file which default exports a function which returns an array of options.

hideAddButton.title: Hide "Add property" button
hideAddButton.desc: Whether to hide the button used to add properties to this group.

iconSetting.title: Icon
iconSetting.desc: Set a custom icon to show for this property.

hiddenSetting.title: Hidden
hiddenSetting.desc: Whether to hide this property from view by default.

defaultValueSetting.title: Default value
defaultValueSetting.desc: Automatically set a property to this value if empty. Note, this will be parsed as YAML.

aliasSetting.title: Alias
aliasSetting.desc: This will be shown in place of the property name in frontmatter.

suggestionsSetting.title: Suggestions
suggestionsSetting.desc: Override the default suggestions with the following.

importSetting.title: Import
importSetting.desc: Paste settings as JSON. This will completely overwrite any existing settings for this property!
importSetting.modalStrutureParseError: Parse error: Data does not conform to expected structure. Check developer console for more details.

exportSetting.title: Export
exportSetting.desc: Copy this property's settings as JSON.

resetSetting.title: Reset
resetSetting.desc: Completely wipe all settings for this property.
resetSetting.modalDesc: This will reset this property's settings which cannot be undone

typesTabGroup.name: Type settings
typesTabGroup.unsupportedTypeDesc: The assigned type of "{{widget.type}}" is not supported for type-specific settings. This is likely because it is a built-in type or it was added by a different plugin than Better Properties

delete.modalDesc: This action will permanently remove the property "{{property}}" from all notes, delete property configurations in this plugin's settings, and cannot be undone.

iconSetting.title: Icon
iconSetting.desc: The icon to show for this property.

rename.modalDesc: Enter a new name to change all instances of the "{{property}}" property in all notes' properties and this plugin's settings
rename.nameExistsWarning: Warning: The name you entered already exists. If you continue, the existing configuration for that name will be overwritten with the configuration from "{{property}}"
